testcase.classname: Testing the features on Personal Banking page
testcase.name: Testing Checking link through the drop down
testcase.system-out: Given PBTa The user is on personal home page................................passed And PBTa BANKING is present on the menu.....................................passed When PBTa cursor is placed on the BANKING menu and click on Checking link...passed Then PBTa the user lands on Personal Checking Accounts page.................passed And PBTa Find the Right Checking Account button is present..................passed When PBTa the user click on Find Right Checking Account button..............passed Then PBTa the user lands on questionnaire page..............................passed And PBTa First question is visible..........................................passed
